name: Bakugan but you're Gingka from Beyblade
name_original: Bakugan but you're Gingka from Beyblade
description: This is the build-up to (what I hope will be) an intense Bakugan battle between Gingka Hagane, a character who's actually from the Beyblade franchise, and one (or more!) of the Battle Brawlers. This first part of the game covers Gingka's first visit to Bakugan Interspace, where his curiosity gets the better of him...
